definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
plus/to put in/to add/to add on/to add into/in addition/on top of that
to become a member/to join/to mix into/to participate in/to add in
to become a member of an alliance or union/to align/to join/participate

in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: All patients were treated with anterior interbody fusion and internal fixation.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者为前路植骨融合加内固定术。

sentences.english: Simply pour ingredients, add ice, stir, and enjoy!
sentences.chinese: 简单的混合原料，加冰块，搅合，享用。

sentences.english: For an extra dose of antioxidants, have a glass of red wine on the side.
sentences.chinese: 为了一个额外分量的抗氧化剂，另外再加一杯红酒。

sentences.english: Also give me clam chowder and a cup of coffee with milk.
sentences.chinese: 再给我蚶汤和一杯加牛奶的咖啡。

sentences.english: We'll toast to the New Year with a glass of bisho wine.
sentences.chinese: 让我们一起喝一杯加香料的果子酒，以贺新年。

sentences.english: Would you like to use ampoule?
sentences.chinese: 请问你喜欢加精华素吗？

sentences.english: If the inviter is studying in Canada, a letter of acceptance from the school.
sentences.chinese: 如果邀请人在加学习，校方出具的录取信。

sentences.english: The cows were branded with an A in a circle.
sentences.chinese: 那些牛被烙上了加圆圈的A字。

sentences.english: History is a very interesting subject.
If you need to add or drop a class, please come to the office to see Ms Lu.
sentences.chinese: 需要办理加退选的家长请到办公室找吕惠中。

sentences.english: Do you know the difference between a puff adder and a gaboon viper?
sentences.chinese: 你知道鼓腹毒蛇和加彭蝰蛇之间的区别吗？

sentences.english: It says, take value of y and value of x, add them together, y and create that as the new value of y.
sentences.chinese: 把x和y的值，加到一起，然后把和赋值给。

sentences.english: Spring gaskets should be added to the ground points, and the connection should be fastened.
sentences.chinese: 各接地连接点应加弹簧垫片，连接紧固可靠。

sentences.english: TS And that is G, u plus pV minus TS.
If necessary, to increase filter, regular maintenance and the provision of a bypass pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 必要时要加滤网，定期检修及设置旁通管路。

sentences.english: how far is it from here to there?
sentences.chinese: 这是对的，谁说there前面不能加定冠词了？

definition: plus/to put in/to add/to add on/to add into/in addition/on top of that
to work extra hours/to do overtime
to become a member/to join/to mix into/to participate in/to add in
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to get rid of/to exclude/to eliminate/to remove/to delete/to strip out/to extract
equivalent to 就可以/can then (do sth)/can immediately (do sth)/(do sth) and that will suffice
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
